name: Finnish Sauna Simulator (DEMO)
description:
Sauna Simulator is all about saunas and good löylys. Experience the best part of Finnish culture, the Sauna! (for free!)

The game is in it's Demo phase so be aware of any bugs or glitches. Sauna Simulator is under active development, but we where kind enough to give you this small demo. 

You could call this an educative game for those who have never visited a sauna before(which i highly recommend).

Sauna simulator at this moment has: only two saunas, achievement system and working user interfaces.

Sauna simulator will have in the future: more maps, -achievements and -some other features that come to mind.

Wikipedia article for those who absolutely don't what a sauna is  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sauna
